metadata.title: CVE-2022-1379 on Ubuntu 18.04 LTS (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: URL Restriction Bypass in GitHub repository plantuml/plantuml prior toV1.2022.5. An attacker can abuse this to bypass URL restrictions that areimposed by the different security profiles and achieve server side requestforgery (SSRF). This allows accessing restricted internal resources/serversor sending requests to third party servers.

criterions.comment: plantuml: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
